name: Scatterplot
author: Daniel Neves
source:
$@onload
    add_input("test", type = "numeric", default = 2, description = "Blabla")
    add_input("x", "expression", expression(1:10), description = "x coordinates for the plot; or structure defining both x and y coordinates.")
    add_input("y", "expression", description = "y coordinates for the plot.")
$@end-onload



$@output Scatterplot, plot

$@if !default(mar)
# set the margins for the plot
par(mar=c(${mar}))
$@end-if

# do the plot
plot(${dn:: x:x, y=y(check.valid = FALSE), type=type, pch=pch, col=col, main=main, xlab=xlab, ylab=ylab})

$@end-output
